field: Southern Cross Distribution Systems Pty Ltd (trading as Galileo Southern Corss) markets, promotes and distributes an electronic reservations network, and supporting administrative software for the travel and tourism industry. The company is a subsidiary of Travelport Worldwide Limited (NYSE
value: TVPT). Travelport supplies distribution, technology, payment and other solutions for the global travel and tourism industry, enabling travel providers, travel agencies, corporations and developers to search, share, buy and sell travel. Southern Cross Distribution Systems is based in Sydney, New South Wales, with additional offices in Brisbane, Perth and Melbourne.
